title: remove loss on first dodge in promos
body: promos are a very important part of the game and when you get the you want to win and try your hardest. but if you know for a fact there is a troll and you will be forced to lose the game you should be able to dodge 1 time with only a 5minutes dodge timer but no lose. its promos and I was just force to dodge due to a troll I had the game 2 seconds before you forced us to lose and I was not going to try my hardest for 30 minutes with someone trolling the whole games. make this a feature or something because it is ridiculous that we are forced to play with trolls during promos or loss the promo match. trolls are bad enough without forcing you not to be able to rank up

replies.body:
This won't happen.

Your best option is to play out the game and do your best
